div.p: Socration and the other collectors of monthly trade tax at Syene. Petorzmethis son of Arabrootis has paid the remaining four drachmas, the total 4 dr. for the trade tax up to 30th Mesore, for the 5th year of Hadrian Caesar, the lord. I, Ammonius, have written. 16th Mesore. Translation: S.A. Aly, ZPE 219 (2021) 152
